CALLOUT.CALLOUTADVISORY: A prison bus crashed at {Zone}, an inmate escaped
CALLOUT.TASK: A prisoner escaped recently. Drive to the last reported area.

DIALOGUE0.DIALOGUE: ~o~Prison Guard:~s~ Hi! I was attacked! The prisoner—he just snapped!
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ He assaulted me while I was watching the traffic. I flipped the bus accidentally, then he jumped out of the bus.
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ He’s on foot now, ran off into the woods wearing his orange jumpsuit!
~y~You:~s~ Do you have any idea where he might be headed?
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ Last I saw, he was headed north, past that ridge over there.
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ He might try to steal a car, or hide somewhere.
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ Be careful—he’s dangerous and desperate!
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ Oh my god, he took my gun, too! I can't find it!

DIALOGUE1.DIALOGUE: ~y~You:~s~ Sir, are you alright? What’s going on here?
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ That inmate lost it! He attacked me out of nowhere!
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ I was checking directions on my tablet, and he took the chance to overpower me. The bus rolled when I tried to stop him.
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ He bolted as soon as we crashed—ran straight into the woods in full orange.
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ Northbound, over that hill. He was fast, too!
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ If he finds a car or a hiding spot, we might lose him.
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ Watch out, officer—he's not thinking straight.
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ Damn it, I just realized… he took my service weapon!
~y~You:~s~ Got it. I’m going after him now.

DIALOGUE2.DIALOGUE: ~o~Prison Guard:~s~ No serious injuries, but it was close. The inmate flipped—he ambushed me!
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ I lost control of the transport vehicle during the struggle. He forced the door open and made a run for it.
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ Last I saw him, he was heading for the tree line. Still in the jumpsuit.
~y~You:~s~ Any clue where he might be going?
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ Could be trying to reach the main road or find a hiding place nearby.
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ He’s unpredictable, and probably armed now.
~o~Prison Guard:~s~ Damn… my firearm’s missing. He must’ve grabbed it in the chaos!
